column4: does anyone maybe know how to turn off network manager and do everything manual?
i believe NM gives you a fair amount of manual control, r-click, edit connections
NM now has the nm-connection-editor as its connection editor, which throws an error whenever I try to edit a connection
Updating connection failed: nm-ifupdown-connection.c.82 - connection update not supported (read-only).. is the error it gives me
